thread.title: Colorado ranks 10th for gainful employment in U.S.
thread.title_full: Colorado ranks 10th for gainful employment in U.S.

author: Aldo Svaldi
title: Colorado ranks 10th for gainful employment in U.S.
text: Federal workers fear layoffs inevitable under Trump budget cuts March 02, 2017, 10:40 am Federal workers are growing increasingly anxious at the prospect of massive budget cuts President Donald Trump proposed this week that would pave the way for increased military spending. Denver created jobs in recovery, but productivity was missing March 02, 2017, 12:04 pm Denver did better than most metro areas in adding jobs and growing its economy coming out of the recession, but it struggled to translate those gains into a broader prosperity, according to a report by the nonprofit Brookings Metro Monitor. Denver set to change some outsourced contracts after parts of new workforce system fall short March 01, 2017, 5:38 pm City officials on Wednesday acknowledged shortcomings in Denver’s newly outsourced workforce development system, prompting several contract changes. Adams 12 to build second technical education campus to accommodate more than 1,000 students February 28, 2017, 4:39 pm The Bollman Technical Education Center at 9451 Washington St. isn’t big enough to accommodate every kid in the district who wants to get into some of the 20 career and technical education classes offered at the adjunct district program.
